definitions.title: vb.
definitions.body: reject, spurn (perh. cf. As. zinû, be angry, esp. of gods Gu:§ 105 Zim:BP 23 ff.)—

definitions.title: Qal
definitions.body: Pf. ´[[ז]] Ho 8:3, Ho 8:5, La 2:7; [[זׇנַחְתָּ]] Ps 44:10 + 2 t.; sf. [[זְנַחְתָָּנִי]] Ps 43:2; [[זְנַחְתָּנוּ]] Ps 60:3, Ps 60:12, Ps 108:12; [[זְנַחְתִּים]] Zec 10:6; Impf. [[יִזְנַח]] Ps 77:8, La 3:31; [[תִּזְנַח]] Ps 44:24 + 2 t.;—reject, Isr. rejects good Ho 8:3; Samaria's calf rejects her Ho 8:5 (others make ´[[י]] subj.; We:Kl. Proph. rds. [[אזנת]] I reject), elsewh. God rejects people Ps 43:2, Ps 60:3, Ps 77:8, Ps 88:15, Zec 10:6; [[לָנֶחַח]] Ps 44:24, Ps 74:1; [[לעולם]] La 3:31; ´[[ולא תחא בחבאתינו ז]] Ps 44:10, Ps 60:12, Ps 108:12; [[נַפְשִׁי מִשָּׁלוֹם]] La 3:17; king Ps 89:39; altar La 2:7.

definitions.title: Hiph.
definitions.body: Pf. [[הִזְנִיחַ]] 2Ch 29:19; sf. [[הִזְנִיחָם]] 2Ch 11:14; 3 pl. [[הֶאֶזְנִיחוּ]] Is 19:6, v. II. [[זנח]]; Impf. [[יַזְנִיחֲךָ]] 1Ch 28:9; —(late) reject (= earlier

definitions.title: Qal
definitions.body: ), Jeroboam rejects the Levites ´[[מכהן לי]] 2Ch 11:14; Ahaz the sacred vessels 2Ch 29:19; ´[[י]] rejects Solomon 1Ch 28:9.
